channel.title: Crashes in Nvidia Surround during Aprehension
channel.description:
I keep trying to attach the dmp files but it says that the file extension is invalid.
Anyways, I am having trouble with the transition between On a Rail and Apprehension. When I am playing in Nvidia surround at 7680x1440 and I hit the loading section between the two while on the Freight Transit, the game crashes. This does not happen if I just continue on foot, even in 3 screen mode. If I let it load Apprehension, then return back to the Freight Transit, it looks like the screenshot taken here: ![2015-05-13_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://687LDUstQKB59QaTUcgmg7HjOXb.jpeg) Headlights and screen floating, but I cannot physically jump on any cart.
If I load the game in 2560x1440, I can get on the Freight Transit just fine and make the transition without issue. However, the game crashes during Apprehension (only while the Freight Transit is with me) if I try to switch the game back to 7680x1440.
I have been loving the game in 3 screen mode up to this point!
Specs: CPU: Intel i7 3930k @ 4.37GHz GPU: EVGA GTX Titan PhysX GPU: EVGA GTX 580 SC Ram: G-SKILL Ripjaw Z 16GB (4x4GB) DDR3 2133
EDIT: So I kept going with the story, [spoiler]crashed the Freight Transit cart into the door[/spoiler] then saved it, and now it is allowing me to load and run the game in 3 screen mode.
